price: কিন্তু সি যদি হয় অস্বীকাৰকাৰী, বিভ্ৰান্তসকলৰ এজন,
arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā in kāna mina al-mukadhibīna al-ḍālīna
